sentences.en: Constant regular meeting is giddy, limply what disease be?
sentences.cn: 常常会头晕, 四肢无力是什么病症?

sentences.en: Diarrhoea, giddy, limply be what to disease get?
sentences.cn: 腹泻 、 头晕 、 四肢无力是得什么病了?

sentences.en: Good evening, I'm Jim Limply , now in the national broadcast center in Beijing China.
sentences.cn: 晚上好, 我是吉姆·兰普利, 现在在中国北京国际演播厅.

sentences.en: Have a fever these days, cold, limply still, how should do?
sentences.cn: 这几天发烧, 感冒, 还四肢无力, 该怎么办 啊 ?

sentences.en: Her hands lying limply where they had happened to fall.
sentences.cn: 她的两只手娇慵地放在身边.

sentences.en: Hung - chien limply implored Miss Su not to see him home.
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 有气无力地恳请苏小姐别送自己.

sentences.en: See the belle is giddy, limply , what disease is this?
sentences.cn: 见到美女就头晕，四肢无力，这是什么病啊？

sentences.en: See the belle is giddy, limply, what disease is this?
sentences.cn: 见到美女就头晕, 四肢无力, 这是什么病 啊 ?

sentences.en: The body was hanging limply from the tree.
sentences.cn: 身体柔软无力地挂在树上.

sentences.en: The daffodils which challenge so proudly and splendidly the boisterous March winds are soon shriveled and defeated, limply wrinkling to remind us of the inevitable ravages of time.
sentences.cn: 曾经那么骄傲而辉煌地迎战三月狂暴寒风的水仙，不久就会凋零衰败，无力而皱巴巴地提醒我们由时间造成的不可避免的损害和创伤。

sentences.en: Your arms can rest limply at your side.
sentences.cn: 双手背可轻轻地在身旁放松.

words.tran_cn: 跛行，一拐一拐地走；缓慢费力地前进
柔软地；四肢无力地，软绵绵地

trans.tran_cn: 柔软地，四肢无力地，无生气地
